column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Can Sodikoff do any wrong? I first fell in love with Gilt Bar
column3: and now Bavette's. The decor is awesome. Classy and traditional. Lots of wood and large chandeliers. But the real winner is the food. I ordered the rib eye and it was excellent. The bernaise sauce on the side was a nice touch. The good cocktail selection helps and I'm looking forward to trying one of these seafood specials.
